resources.string:
Documentation

A manual for the use of Secure SMS Proxy can be found here: Manual.

Disclaimer

The author assumes no responsibility, gives no guarantee when using the application.

The application is free. The source code is available as open source under the Apache 2.0 license.

S2MSP only works with the permissions to send and receive SMS. S2MSP provides SMS communication to other applications for previously authorized phone numbers. The SMS exchange between S2MSP and authorized applications is always encrypted. S2MSP uses no other permissions to ensure the security and integrity. Due to new sideloading restrictions on Android 15 and above, \"Allow restricted settings\" must be enabled in the S2MSP \"App info\" dialog before the permissions can be granted!
S2MSP was crashed unexpectedly. To improve the stability of S2MSP, please send the crash report to the author via e-mail.
The stated application requests permissions to send and receive SMS via S2MSP restricted to the following phone numbers:
Logo of the app that requests SMS permissions
To work reliable on all devices, S2MSP should run with battery optimization turned off.
